T02D1362:167a-1: shr'i k'a la tsa kra ri ti ti sa ha dza s'a dha n'am n'a ma /
T02D1362:167b-0: dpal dus kyi 'khor @167b lo skad cig gis bskyed
T02D1362:167b-1: pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
T02D1362:167b-2: / bde ba chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1362:167b-3: rnam pa dang bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ma des rab tu 'khyud //
T02D1362:167b-4: skye 'jig rnam par spangs pa'i mi 'gyur bde la dgod pa la sogs rnams dang bral ba yis //
T02D1362:167b-5: sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed par mdzad pa'i sku gsum dang bcas dus gsum yang dag mkhyen pa po //
T02D1362:167b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa dang po'i mchog gi sangs rgyas gnyis med de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1362:167b-7: dang po skad cig gcig gis stong pa la gnas phyi nas de bzhin skad cig gis bskyed pa //
T02D1362:167b-8: sna tshogs chu skyes zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas dbang phyug dang //
T02D1362:167b-9: 'dod lha dag gi snying gar g-yas brkyang shin tu
T02D1362:167b-10: sngo ba rdo rje dril bu dang ldan phyag gnyis
T02D1362:167b-11: kyis // sna tshogs yum gyi sku la yang dag 'khyud pa'i dpal ldan mnga' bdag dus 'khor lo //
T02D1362:167b-12: sprin nag lta bu'i ral pa'i tshogs la ta ma la mtshungs mi bskyod pa la sogs pas spras //
T02D1362:167b-13: phyag rgya drug gis kyang ni rab spras thod pa dkar po'i phreng bas bcings pa gang //
T02D1362:167b-14: mi mgo'i do shal spyan gsum gser mtshungs sku mnga' gri gug pad snod dang ldan phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1362:167b-15: dpal ldan sna tshogs yum dang gnyis med bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sogs bsgom par bya //
T02D1362:167b-16: de nas khams gsum rang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de rnams ma lus lha mo'i sku la bzhugs //
T02D1362:167b-17: de yang rang la rang lus gdan dang bcas pa nyi ma la ste nyi ma h'um la'o //
T02D1362:167b-18: a'u ni ha la de yang mgo bo la ste de nyid zla ba phyed pa nyid la'o //
T02D1362:167b-19: zla phyed thig le de nyid n'a da de bzhin nam mkha' kha rlangs me long la phog mtshungs //
T02D1362:167b-20: de ltar 'od gsal zhugs nas slar yang snga ma dang mtshungs gzugs su dran par byas pa dang //
T02D1362:167b-21: sprul pa sna tshogs khams gsum rnams su nam mkha' khyab par skad cig gis ni spro bar bya //
T02D1362:167b-22: de ltar yang ni de bzhin bsdu zhing yang ni de ltar bskyed cing spro ba de bzhin du //
T02D1362:167b-23: mnyam par gzhag pa'i zung 'jug lam dang 'di yis ni //
T02D1362:167b-24: sangs rgyas zhabs la yang dag 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02D1362:167b-25: dpal ldan dus 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1362:167b-26: gang byas pa yi bsod nams 'dis //
T02D1362:167b-27: 'jig rten pa rnams lhan skyes kyang //
T02D1362:168a-0: gnyis med rang bzhin zhabs thobs shog / dpal @168a * //
T02D1362:168a-1: dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1362:168a-2: slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1362:168a-4: // / pandi ta b'a g'i shva ra dang /
